title: LOL DL C++ 1935 error
body: Its been awhile since I have played league. since i just bought a new desktop, I thought I would pick it back up. I get the error that says the prerequisite cannot be downloaded. I have searched a good hour or so just to try to find help on downloading the game. explaining step by step would be most helpful, please and thanks.

replies.body: Congrats on your new rig!  You may need to update your Windows so it can setup some missing applications that may be preventing a complete installation of the client.  Before all else, I recommend doing that first!  Specifically, you may be missing [C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  That should fix you up!
